full_summary:
**CARE HVAC Systems Renovations – Phase 2, Egbert, Ontario**

**Reference: WS3770587369**

**Amendment Number: 5**

This tender announcement pertains to the second phase of the two-phase solicitation process for the `CARE HVAC Systems Renovations` project in Egbert, Ontario. This current phase entails the solicitation of financial bids from pre-qualified suppliers.

**Project Details:**
The project involves the removal of existing rooftop units (RTUs), demolition of ductwork, installation of new rooftop units, and modification of existing ductwork. The scope of work includes the supply of new, high-efficiency rooftop air conditioning units, building automation control systems, piping, and associated work.

**Prerequisites:**
Applicants must have successfully completed the first phase of the solicitation process, which evaluated the qualifications of all interested suppliers. 

**Tender Requirements:**
The successful contractor must perform and complete the work within 40 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer. The tender offer must include all products, labor, equipment, and removal and installation as required or implied by the drawings and specifications.

**Solicitation Information:**

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3770587369
* **Publication Date:** July 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 14, 2023 at 14:00 HAE
* **Amendment Date:** August 2, 2023
* **End User:** Department of the Environment (ECCC)

**Contact Information:**

* Zobia Essa (SPAC/PSPC)
* email: zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca (Please use this email address for all inquiries pertaining to this tender announcement) 

Please note that all bid submissions after 2:00 PM EDT on August 14, 2023 will be deemed non-responsive. Failure to meet the specified requirements means your bid will be rejected. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or if you need any clarification regarding this announcement.  It is a competitive bid, open to all eligible suppliers. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price from the submissions received. 

Please ensure you check the solicitation notice entirety on the website designated. 

 Ci-dessous, vous en trouverez une version française.
